Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan and Sri Lanka will square off in an exciting T20 Asia Cup 2022 final clash tonight.
Sri Lanka played 11 out of 14 Asia Cup finals previously. Today will be their 12th out of 15th. If they win, it will be their sixth title.
Pakistan played four finals previously and has won two titles.
Green shirts and Islanders have faced each other four times. Men in Green won only once and lost thrice.
The high-octane clash will kick off at 7pm.
